mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, user_id, book_id, quantity, cart_date) VALUES (cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{book_id}, #{quantity}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.user_id, c.book_id, c.quantity, c.cart_date, b.book_title, b.book_writer, b.book_price, b.book_isbn,b.book_image_path FROM cart c JOIN book b ON c.book_id = b.book_id WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.cart_date DESC
